name: EcoHive
description: A blockchain-powered marketplace that tracks products' carbon footprints and rewards sustainable choices with eco-tokens. Features AI-driven recommendations, real-time environmental impact tracking, and partnerships with major retailers.

name: HealthSync AI
description: An advanced health analytics platform using federated learning to predict health risks with 94% accuracy. Integrates with Apple Health, Fitbit, and medical records while maintaining HIPAA compliance. Features include personalized nutrition plans and early disease detection.

name: MetaMaker Studio
description: A no-code metaverse creation platform with real-time collaboration. Features include AI-powered 3D modeling, physics simulation, NFT integration, and cross-platform VR support. Used by major educational institutions and gaming studios.

name: FarmIQ Pro
description: Precision agriculture platform using satellite imagery, IoT sensors, and machine learning for crop optimization. Features include drone integration, automated irrigation systems, and predictive pest management. Increased yield by 40% for users.

name: NeuroLearn AI
description: Revolutionary education platform using GPT-4 and reinforcement learning for personalized tutoring. Features include real-time language translation, AR/VR lessons, and adaptive learning paths. Proven 60% improvement in student performance.
